en.title: Representative's Details
en.line1: Please enter details of the representative as stated on your tribunal form.
en.line2: We will only use these details to contact this representative about this case.

cy.title: Representative's Details (Welsh)
cy.line1: Please enter details of the representative as stated on your tribunal form. (Welsh)
cy.line2: We will only use these details to contact this representative about this case. (Welsh)

representativeOrganisationName.required: Please enter organisation or business name

representativeContactNumber.required: Please enter a valid contact number
representativeContactNumber.invalid: Please enter a valid contact number

representativeEmailAddress.required: Please enter a valid email address
representativeEmailAddress.invalid: Every email address consists of 3 elements: local-part, @ symbol (pronounced as “at”), and a domain name
